guidetextdraw_1525909549._value:
Please consult your contribution agreement and any subsequent correspondence relating to allocation of funding while completing this claim request. Any variances must be adequately justified. For example, when actual expenses are different from the estimates detailed in the Adjudication Result Summary, please explain the variance in the Progress and Variance section. (e.g. if completion of a consultant's work took one extra day, or if only two people were able to attend a training session where three were approved, etc.).



You should always discuss possible changes with the program management team before undertaking them to seek prior approval. In some cases, an amendment to your contribution agreement may be necessary. Some alterations of expenses may be approved, but submitting these before discussing with the program and seeking approval will result in a delay of any payment, as will insufficient explanations of progress and variance.



Claims may be made on one or more of the approved components of your project -- simply select which component(s) are relevant before beginning to detail your expenses.



Please note: Budget details pre-populated in the claim request.
guidetextdraw_1525909549.name: textdraw1638390095381

guidetextdraw.text:
Please consult your contribution agreement and any subsequent correspondence relating to allocation of funding while completing this claim form. Any variances must be

adequately justified. For example, when actual expenses are different from the estimates detailed in the Adjudication Form, please explain the variance in the Progress and

Variance section. (e.g. if completion of a consultant's work took one extra day, or if only two people were able to attend a training session where three were approved, etc.).

You should always discuss possible changes with the program management team before undertaking them to seek prior approval. In some cases, an amendment to your

contribution agreement may be necessary. Some alterations of expenses may be approved, but submitting these before discussing with the program and seeking approval will

result in a delay of any payment, as will insufficient explanations of progress and variance.

Claims may be made on one or more of the approved components of your project -- simply select which component(s) are relevant before beginning to detail your expenses.<br/>

 

The form will automatically calculate totals based on the details you provide. Once completed, please be sure to click the Validate button on the last page of this form. After

validation is successful, you may upload the form to Partners@International and submit it.

Please note: Budget details pre-populated in the form are provided as indicative, for your convenience, and may not be accurate.

guidetextbox_copy_15.name: totalProgramApprovedPayment

guidetextdraw._value:
Notes to Applicants

  1. In this section, Recipient can upload supporting documentation needed for a decision regarding their Claims
  2. All other files are optional
  3. Accepted file formats can be .pdf,.doc,.docx, .xls, .xlsx,.png,.jpg,.gif,
  4. It is important to label each uploaded file for easy identification, note that file names should not be longer than 100 characters
  5. Each file size may not exceed 10MB
  6. Recipient can upload as many files as needed
  7. If you wish to make changes to file, Delete the uploaded file by selecting X on the corresponding file and upload a new one after deletion
  8. After completing this page, click the "Save Draft" to save or "Next" button proceed with your Claim submission
guidetextdraw.name: textdraw1608314073966

//\\n case \\"FDI Strategic Planning and Analysis\\": {\\n console.log(\\"Found - FDI Strategic Planning and Analysis\\");\\n pnlStrategicComponent.visible = true;\\n pnlStrategicComponent.stratComponentTitle.value = vProjectComponentArray[i].gac_name;\\n stratComponentNumber.value = vProjectComponentArray[i].gac_componentnumber;\\n }\\n break;\\n case \\"FDI Lead Generation and Meetings with Potential Investors\\": {\\n console.log(\\"Found - FDI Lead Generation and Meetings with Potential Investors\\");\\n pnlLeadComponent.visible = true;\\n pnlLeadComponent.leadComponentTitle.value = vProjectComponentArray[i].gac_name;\\n leadComponentNumber.value = vProjectComponentArray[i].gac_componentnumber;\\n lead_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid.value = vProjectComponentArray[i].gac_fdiprojectcomponentid;\\n leadGenNumMeetings.value = vProjectComponentArray[i].gac_actualnumberofmeetings;\\n }\\n break;\\n default: { console.log(\\"CANNOT FIND PANEL\\"); }\\n }\\n}\\n\\nthis.enabled = false;\\nbtPutPropOutcomes.enabled = true;\\nconsole.log(\\"btGetComponents - Click----END\\");\\n"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

guidetextdraw._value:
Thank you for your input!

Please review each section before you click submit.

Once submitted, you will only be able to make changes by contacting us by email at

(communities.communautes@international.gc.ca).

i < claimComponents.length; i++) {\\n console.log(\\"i: \\" + i);\\n if (i > 0) destObj.instanceManager.insertInstance();\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].txTitle.value = claimComponents[i].gac_name;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].txComponentNumber.value = claimComponents[i].gac_componentnumber;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].activitiesCompleted2.value = claimComponents[i].gac_componentactivitiescompleted;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].progressDescription2.value = claimComponents[i].gac_componentprogressandvariance;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].totalActualCostComponentForThisClaim.value = claimComponents[i].gac_actualcomponentcostinclaim;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].totalApprovedActualCostComponentForThisClaim.value = claimComponents[i].gac_totalcomponentamountclaimed;\\n\\n console.log(\\"destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].txTitle = \\" + destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].txTitle.value);\\n console.log(\\"ClaimComponent: \\" + claimComponents[i].gac_fdiclaimcomponentid + \\"=\\" + claimComponents[i].gac_name);\\n\\n/*** Setup for looping through expenses ***/\\n var destObjExp = destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].pnlActivityExpenses.pnlActivityExpense;\\n var claimExpensesResult = getClaimExpenseItemsByCompID(claimComponents[i].gac_fdiclaimcomponentid);\\n\\n/*** Loop for each Expense item ***/\\n for (var j = 0; //Besco-Apr27-2022- originally 'submitClaimData'\\n\\n/* Besco-Jan-15-2023\\n */\\n// Final Report Page --- Section 1\\nvar vFinalResultsJsonObj = {\\n \\"egcs_fc_profile_egcs_fc_profileid\\": getProposalID()\,\\n \\"egcs_fc_profile\\": {\\n \\"gac_contributiontoimprovecapacitytoattract_yn\\": gac_contributiontoimprovecapacitytoattract_yn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualcontributiontoimprovefdiattraction\\": gac_actualcontributiontoimprovefdiattraction.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_impactonenhancingfdiknowledgeyn\\": gac_impactonenhancingfdiknowledgeyn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualprojectimpactonenhancingfdiknowledg\\": gac_actualprojectimpactonenhancingfdiknowledg.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_impactonforeigninvestorawareness_yn\\": gac_impactonforeigninvestorawareness_yn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualimpactonforeigninvestorawareness\\": gac_actualimpactonforeigninvestorawareness.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_actualnumberoftargetsgenerated\\": gac_actualnumberoftargetsgenerated.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofleadsgenerated\\": gac_actualnumberofleadsgenerated.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofprospectsgenerated\\": gac_actualnumberofprospectsgenerated.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_impactonretentionexpansionawareness_yn\\": gac_impactonretentionexpansionawareness_yn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualprojectimpactonretentionexpansionaw\\": gac_actualprojectimpactonretentionexpansionaw.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_contributiontoimprovingservices_yn\\": gac_contributiontoimprovingservices_yn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualprojectcontributiontoimprovingservi\\": gac_actualprojectcontributiontoimprovingservi.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_benefitsandlessonslearned\\": gac_benefitsandlessonslearned.value\\n\\n }\\n};\\nsubmitFinalReportData2(vFinalResultsJsonObj); //Besco-Jan10 -- \\n\\n// Final Report Page --- Section 2 --> Components\\n\\nvar vProjCompObj = {\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid\\": trn_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid.value\,\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent\\": {\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofpeopletrained\\": trnNumPeopleAttended.value\\n }\\n};\\n\\nputProjectComponentOutcome(vProjCompObj);\\n\\nvProjCompObj = {\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid\\": tool_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid.value\,\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent\\": {\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofprospectsreached\\": toolsMatNumPartners.value\\n }\\n};\\n\\nputProjectComponentOutcome(vProjCompObj);\\n\\nvProjCompObj = {\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid\\": lead_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid.value\,\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent\\": {\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofmeetings\\": leadGenNumMeetings.value\\n }\\n};\\n\\n// not needed ??? putProjectComponentOutcome(vProjCompObj);\\nmessagePanel.visible = true;\\nmyTimer = setInterval(resetMsg\, 5000);\\n/*\\n * will hide the message label after 10 secs\\n */\\nfunction resetMsg() {\\n messagePanel.visible = false;\\n clearTimeout(myTimer);\\n}"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.mainSection.toolbar.btSave"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"testjs();\\n//$(\\".ceci-loading\\").show();\\n//submits claim record to Dynamics\\n//\\nif (ckAuthorization.value === 'true'){\\n console.log(\\"ckAuthorization is TRUE\\");\\n var obj2 = 'true';}\\nelse {console.log(\\"ckAuthorization is FALSE\\");\\n var obj2 = 'false';}\\n\\n//\\nvar obj1 = claimTitle.value;\\n//var obj2 = ckAuthorization.value;\\nvar obj3 = lastClaimForThisAgreement.value;\\nsubmitClaimData(obj1\, obj2\, obj3);\\n//generating dor and submit to rdbmis\\n//debugger; this line was here as of 'Aug11A' build--> build AND deployed in PRD as well -->>> very bad.\\n//generateAndUploadDor(\\"/content/forms/af/ceci/claim_form\\");\\n\\n//Besco-Dec08-Commented below DoR call due to complexity of Java bundle reconfig w/Carm.\\n//remove 'rdms' servlets from \\"core\\"\, only use new Eclispe bundle... much testing is required.\\n\\n//Besco- Feb10-2023 \\"uncommented line below to enable autoupload to RDMS\\ngenerateAndUploadDor(\\"/content/forms/af/ceci/claim_form\\");\\n\\n// ***** submits the Final Report\\nif (lastClaimForThisAgreement.value === \\"true\\") {\\n console.log(\\"Section 1- SAVE to Proposal in CRM - Click\\");\\n console.log(\\"btPutProposal - Click\\");\\n\\n // // ***** Section 1 - Save Project Outcome in CRM\\n var vFinalResultsJsonObj = {\\n \\"egcs_fc_profile_egcs_fc_profileid\\": getProposalID()\,\\n \\"egcs_fc_profile\\": {\\n \\"gac_contributiontoimprovecapacitytoattract_yn\\": gac_contributiontoimprovecapacitytoattract_yn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualcontributiontoimprovefdiattraction\\": gac_actualcontributiontoimprovefdiattraction.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_impactonenhancingfdiknowledgeyn\\": gac_impactonenhancingfdiknowledgeyn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualprojectimpactonenhancingfdiknowledg\\": gac_actualprojectimpactonenhancingfdiknowledg.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_impactonforeigninvestorawareness_yn\\": gac_impactonforeigninvestorawareness_yn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualimpactonforeigninvestorawareness\\": gac_actualimpactonforeigninvestorawareness.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_actualnumberoftargetsgenerated\\": gac_actualnumberoftargetsgenerated.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofleadsgenerated\\": gac_actualnumberofleadsgenerated.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofprospectsgenerated\\": gac_actualnumberofprospectsgenerated.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_impactonretentionexpansionawareness_yn\\": gac_impactonretentionexpansionawareness_yn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualprojectimpactonretentionexpansionaw\\": gac_actualprojectimpactonretentionexpansionaw.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_contributiontoimprovingservices_yn\\": gac_contributiontoimprovingservices_yn.value\,\\n \\"gac_actualprojectcontributiontoimprovingservi\\": gac_actualprojectcontributiontoimprovingservi.value\,\\n\\n \\"gac_benefitsandlessonslearned\\": gac_benefitsandlessonslearned.value\\n\\n }\\n };\\n submitFinalReportData2(vFinalResultsJsonObj); //Besco-Jan10 -- \\n\\n// ***** Section 2 - Save Project Components in CRM\\n console.log(\\"btPutPropOutcomes - Click\\");\\n console.log(\\"Section 2 - Save Claim Components in CRM - Click\\");\\n\\n var vProjCompObj = {\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid\\": trn_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid.value\,\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent\\": {\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofpeopletrained\\": trnNumPeopleAttended.value\\n }\\n };\\n putProjectComponentOutcome(vProjCompObj);\\n\\n vProjCompObj = {\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid\\": tool_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid.value\,\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent\\": {\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofprospectsreached\\": toolsMatNumPartners.value\\n }\\n };\\n putProjectComponentOutcome(vProjCompObj);\\n\\n vProjCompObj = {\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid\\": lead_gac_fdiprojectcomponentid.value\,\\n \\"gac_fdiprojectcomponent\\": {\\n \\"gac_actualnumberofmeetings\\": leadGenNumMeetings.value\\n }\\n };\\n putProjectComponentOutcome(vProjCompObj);\\n}\\n\\n//TODO we should call this ONLY if the CRM submission is successful\\n//guideBridge.submit(); \\nsubmitConfirmationPanel.visible = false;\\npnlThankYou.visible = true;\\n//$(\\".ceci-loading\\").hide();"\,"event":"Click"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel.submitConfirmationPanel.section.btnYes"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]

fd:scripts.fd:click: [{"script":{"content":"console.log(\\"Document of Record_EN - Click --- Jul21a\\");\\ngetDebugMode();\\nvar destObj = guideRootPanel.mainSection.reviewSubmitPanel.pnlDoRdata.pnlComponents.pnlComponent;\\n\\n/*** Loop for each Component ***/\\nfor (var i = 0; i < claimComponents.length; i++) {\\n console.log(\\"i: \\" + i);\\n if (i > 0) destObj.instanceManager.insertInstance();\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].txTitle.value = claimComponents[i].gac_name;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].txComponentNumber.value = claimComponents[i].gac_componentnumber;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].activitiesCompleted2.value = claimComponents[i].gac_componentactivitiescompleted;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].progressDescription2.value = claimComponents[i].gac_componentprogressandvariance;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].totalActualCostComponentForThisClaim.value = claimComponents[i].gac_actualcomponentcostinclaim;\\n destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].totalApprovedActualCostComponentForThisClaim.value = claimComponents[i].gac_totalcomponentamountclaimed;\\n\\n console.log(\\"destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].txTitle = \\" + destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].txTitle.value);\\n console.log(\\"ClaimComponent: \\" + claimComponents[i].gac_fdiclaimcomponentid + \\"=\\" + claimComponents[i].gac_name);\\n\\n /*** Setup for looping through expenses ***/\\n var destObjExp = destObj.instanceManager.instances[i].pnlActivityExpenses.pnlActivityExpense;\\n var claimExpensesResult = getClaimExpenseItemsByCompID(claimComponents[i].gac_fdiclaimcomponentid);\\n\\n /*** Loop for each Expense item ***/\\n for (var j = 0;
